page.title: 18GAMES
page.content: Children's games vary from age to age and place to place. Here are two of the favourite games played in our area. FIREBALL is a game played by around twelve or more players, who stand in a large circle. A ball is thrown round the circle. Whenever anybody drops the ball they must run all the way round the circle and back to their place, while the ball continues to be thrown round the circle. If, when the player who dropped the ball is still running round the circle, the ball is bounced in his or her place, that person is out. This is continued until only one person is left. That person is the winner.
